query:
UPDATE artist_info SET bio = 'Benjamin Thomas is a contemporary abstract artist based in London. His practice unfolds as an ongoing exploration of form and material, with each artwork marking a distinct point within a connected and evolving body of work.

Thomas approaches painting as a means of refining his intuitive visual language over time. Forms, gestures and surfaces carry forward from one piece to the next, reappearing through layering, reproduction and shifts in process. Earlier works often inform later ones, creating connections across different materials and formats.

Each painting stands independently, yet also contributes to a broader aesthetic continuity — a thread that runs through the practice as impulses, forms and materials continue to evolve.

His Upcycled series extends this approach to found vinyl records sourced in East London, where painted intervention and preserved sound coexist within a single object.';
